INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of decrease of the plasma concentrations of the olanzapine and of its therapeutic effectiveness, due to increase of its hepatic metabolism by the carbamazepine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, and if needed, adjustment of the dosage of the olanzapine.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the concentrations of the olanzapine, with risk of increase of its undesirable effects, due to decrease of its hepatic metabolism by the fluvoxamine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possible reduction of the dosage of the olanzapine during the treatment with fluvoxamine.
